ry, I was exhausted (up for 48 hours between shoveling out my car and every=

put it down to being very "punchy", feeling=C2=A0 a bit out of it, and wand=
ering into the middle of someone else's conversation. 
One of the reasons I=
 prefer the phone to email for some things.
I'm feeling much better now, th=
ank you, after about 10 hours of sleep.....
Again, sorry for being inapprop=
riate and butting in.
Adrienne
